# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)CHANGELOG
(?:^|/)(?i)HISTORY
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
(?:^|/)common/
(?:^|/)\.rush/
(?:^|/)\.angular/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
\.log$
^\.docker/
^\.github/
^\.vscode/
